com.castlabs.android.views

Interface SubtitlesViewComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent

    public interface SubtitlesViewComponent
extends PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent
    This is a PlayerViewPlugin.PlayerViewComponent that will be automatically used when you are using a PlayerView.

    You can use this component to get access the View that renders the subtitles, for instance, if you need to apply an offset to it when player controls overlap.

    To access the component and then the view, you can use: 

    
     SubtitlesViewComponent component = playerView.getComponent(SubtitlesViewComponent.class);
     View subtitlesView = component.getView();

    Since:
    4.0.2

    • Method Detail

      • setSubtitlesMargins

        void setSubtitlesMargins(int top,
                         int bottom,
                         int left,
                         int right)
        Set the subtitle margins in pixels. The margins are applied to the subtitles located above or below the horizontal middle of the video view (top or bottom margins) and to the left or right of the vertical middle of the video view (left or right margins).
        Parameters:
        top - The top margin
        bottom - The bottom margin
        left - The left margin
        right - The right margin
